def_cn: （用来表示比率、比例等）每，每一
def_en: You use per to express rates and ratios. For example, if something costs £50 per year, you must pay £50 each year for it. If a vehicle is travelling at 40 miles per hour, it travels 40 miles each hour.  per head→see: head;
If something happens as per a particular plan or suggestion, it happens in the way planned or suggested.
